definition: something intended to deceive, trick or deceive
details:
noun
- something intended to deceive
= synonyms: put-on
- communication (written or spoken) intended to deceive
= synonyms: snake oil
- pretentious or silly talk or writing
= synonyms: drool, baloney, boloney, bilgewater, bosh, taradiddle, tarradiddle, tommyrot, tosh, twaddle
verb
- trick or deceive
